title: Dont I get a free mystery skin? Since i had Riot Kayle
body: thought i read that somewhere x.x All i got was a summoner icon..

replies.body: Wait till the 23rd. That is the last day they are sending out gifts for this. If you don't get it by then, send in a ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=37yXgRgI,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-18T23:12:15.667+0000)
>
> Wait till the 23rd. That is the last day they are sending out gifts for this. If you don't get it by then, send in a ticket.

Yup! Please hang tight - there's a lot of gifts to hand out! :o You'll see a notification for your skin!

Just a question: Are we supposed to get a notification along with Rito Kayle or is it just silent?

For clarification, I did get Riot Kayle, but I had to check for her in my profile.
You would have only received a notification for the mystery skin.
Personally, I don't think it would hurt to get a notification about any kind of non-standard reward.

I'm not sure it was possible due to the manner in which it was simply added (granted) to an account, whereas, mystery gifts work just like a normal player to player gift would work and give you that notification pop because you're legit opening it. 

It's something we could bring up and consider for the future, though.
I thought the previous time we got a free mystery skin for being a good player, it had a popup like a normal mystery gift.
Yup, but that was a mystery gift v. mass adding a particular skin (and champ if needed) to an account.

It's because the coding for that is there.

There is no coding to see such a fancy pop-up when getting _just_ a skin.
UPDATE EVERYONE!!! I got Prototype Viktor just moments ago after a game. Thank you Riot. Ive never played him before though xD
I haven't even recieved the Icon yet.
wait till the 21st. i also own riot kayle and have not received my mystery skin yet and already got the icon.
store history shows i recieved the icon only. everything else i have bought myself

I had the same announcement (icon only, no mention of a skin), but I owned Riot Kayle when I checked the Champions page.

I'd probably send a support ticket to figure out which skin you received, but it was likely unlocked.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=37yXgRgI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-18T20:42:07.324+0000)
>
> I had the same announcement (icon only, no mention of a skin), but I owned Riot Kayle when I checked the Champions page.
> 
> I'd probably send a support ticket to figure out which skin you received, but it was likely unlocked.

I only received the icon and I dont even have Kayle or the skin.
